title: Super Bowl Delivers Huge Ratings, Super Golf League
itunes:title: Super Bowl Delivers Huge Ratings, Super Golf League
description:
The numbers are in for Super Bowl LVI viewership; Rams-Bengals had the largest audience for a Super Bowl in five seasons. Plus, some high profile PGA Tour players have been considering offers from the rumored Saudi-backed Super League. Scarlet Fu and Mike Lynch discuss all that and more on this Wednesday edition of Bloomberg Business of Sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
